body.name: SIAGO Electric Standing Desk Adjustable - 48 x 24 Inch Sit Stand up Desk with Cable Management - 3 Memory Preset Adjustable Height Desk Computer Home Office Desk
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22. Order within 19 hrs 12 mins
features: Rock-solid Stability : Featured 19.8cu.in. larger connection area (at full height) with 1.5mm commercial-grade frame, SIAGO standing desk ensure stability and durability for long-lasting usage. Firm foundation for work at any height, eliminating any distractions from wobbling.
Reliable&Durable : This electric standing desk lifting power enough to fully loaded office and game equipment up to 200lbs. 50000 times lift tests for years of using.

Adjustable Height Desk : Effortlessly transition from sitting to standing with just the touch of a button (27.95" to 45.67") to add comfort throughout the day. SIAGO stand up desk is a great tool on your path toward stay active, healthy and productive.

Customized Sit Stand Desk : The reliable motor operates quietly (under 45 dB)and smoothly, all your things stay steady&secure in motion. The intuitive control panel allows you to preset 3 preferred heights, switch between sitting and standing positions has never been easier. Child lock for total peace of mind.

Organize Your Workstation : 48"x24" eco-friendly desktop provides you with a spacious workspace. (The 40-inch version is a whole-piece) Integrated cable management tray and hooks for headphones or bags, ensuring a tidy workspace. Say goodbye to cable chaos and focus on what matters!

Easy assembly&Technical Support : All holes are pre-drilled and all accessories are pre-labled clearly for quick 30-minute setup. Focusing on quality & customer experience, SIAGO puts customers first and definitely deserves your trust. 2-Year Warranty cover- any questions about SIAGO standing desk, feel free to contact us via Amazon.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Game-Changer for Home Office Ergonomics
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I've been working from home for the last two years and have struggled with desks that just couldn't meet my needs. Sitting all day felt like a recipe for eventual back issues, but cheap standing desk solutions were unsteady and didn't offer the workspace I needed. Enter the Adjustable Height Desk: the answer to all my home office needs.Assembly and Installation: ★★★★☆ (4/5)The assembly was relatively straightforward, although a second pair of hands would definitely make the process smoother. All parts were clearly labeled, and the instruction manual was mostly easy to follow. The only hiccup was that some screws seemed a bit hard to fit into their designated holes, but with a little elbow grease, everything came together.Build Quality: ★★★★★ (5/5)I'm particularly impressed by the build quality of this desk. The metal frame feels sturdy, and the wooden tabletop is solid without being excessively heavy. All the mechanical parts slide smoothly, making adjustments easy and reliable. It feels like a premium piece of furniture that will last for years.Features and Functionality: ★★★★★ (5/5)Height Adjustability: The smooth, electric height adjustment is a game-changer. With the press of a button, I can easily switch from sitting to standing, making my workday much more ergonomic.Memory Settings: The desk has three memory settings, so my partner and I can quickly adjust it to our preferred heights without manual tinkering every time.Large Workspace: The tabletop offers ample space for my dual-laptop setup, keyboard, mouse, and even a few desk plants if you like!Aesthetics: ★★★★★ (5/5)This desk is not just functional but also visually pleasing. The modern design with clean lines easily fits into my home office setup. I opted for the walnut finish, which adds a touch of sophistication.Customer Service: ★★★★★ (5/5)I had a small issue with a missing screw, but one quick call to customer service resolved the problem. They promptly sent a replacement, and the representative was polite and helpful throughout the process.Price Point: ★★★★☆ (4/5)While this desk is not the cheapest option available, you definitely get what you pay for. It's an investment in a high-quality, versatile piece of furniture that addresses the challenges of a dynamic work-from-home environment.Final Thoughts:If you're in the market for a robust, feature-packed, and stylish adjustable height desk, look no further. This desk has significantly improved my work-from-home experience, and I cannot recommend it highly enough. Whether you're a freelancer, a remote worker, or even a student, this desk adapts to all your needs while encouraging a healthier work lifestyle.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars High quality and competitive price
reviews.reviewText: I'm happy to share my experience with this electric adjustable desk, which I've been using for the past 10 days since receiving and assembling it. First of all, I want to commend the desk's simple installation process. The user manual is very concise and labels each component, making it easy for me to locate them. The installation steps are detailed, with accompanying images, allowing me to understand how each part should be correctly assembled.Next, I must mention the desk's excellent quality, especially the wooden surface. It's smooth, has a deep color, and looks aesthetically pleasing. The adjustable height feature satisfies me greatly. With my previous regular desk, cleaning was a hassle, but with this adjustable desk, I can raise it to thoroughly clean every corner without straining my back.The second picture shows the desk after I completed the assembly. Since then, whenever I need to clean or work on my computer, I simply raise it to the desired height, thanks to the height adjustment panel that allows for three presets. What's most important is the child lock, which has been crucial in preventing any accidents caused by my children touching it.In terms of price, this desk offers great value, and I would highly recommend it to my friends!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy and quiet
reviews.reviewText: I have been in the market to look for a rising desk for a while and came across this item. First of all, the price is within my budget, the quality is study and perfect size for my room. Easy and fast to assemble with a power drill. The instruction was clear. The motor was quiet when you try to adjust the height. They even came with extra screws just in case you miss some. You can adjust to the perfect height for your comfort level. Very solid built and sturdy for sure. Definitely recommend it for the people who likes adjustability.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exceptional Performance from this e-adjustable desk
reviews.reviewText: I'm actually very impressed with the performance of this electric adjustable standing desk. This electric adjustable standing desk is an absolute value-for-money choice.Whether you're an office worker or a remote professional, this desk works well.It effortlessly set the desk to your desired height and almost silent operation during height adjustments. The sturdiness of this electric adjustable standing desk is also nice. Regardless of how high I raise the desktop, it remains solid. It also contains small holder for electric stripe and middle loop for your wires.I would say it's nice one to choose.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A perfect addition to my home office
reviews.reviewText: The desk arrived perfectly and was easy to mount, the instructions are clear and the spare parts are a plus. Its manage is simple and smooth, silent when using it. It is a great addition to our home office so I can stand to avoid back pains from being sit all day! The only thing is the cable grommet, it is nice and shiny but the hole is small for the display power cord - so we are looking for an alternative, will probably buy a cheap replacement that matches the table color and move on. Would totally recommend it!Edit: it turns out the rubber piece in the grommet is detachable, so I could remove it and pass all the cables through. Really happy with it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quality Standing Desk! Love it!
reviews.reviewText: I was concerned with assembly, but I was able to assemble the desk within 45 minutes with basic tools and no assistance. Very easy instructions. After assembled, I verified operation and checking different heights. Very cool. The memory on the controller holds the saved settings even if unplugged! Which is another bonus when moving the desk to another room. Not sure the max height, but using setting of 100 is ideal for me. While sitting, I use 72, but I believe 70 is the lowest the desk can be set to. It's very sturdy and well built. The desk was able to achieve my saved settings, without issue, with 2 monitors, laptop, keyboard, and mouse with pad. The rustic brown is also very elegant looking. This was a smart choice among all the other electronic standing desks available. Overall, I think was an awesome buy, and I am very happy with it!
